ygData.subject: Re: Skill Caps
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree with you Jay. It is ridiculous that our main skills have a cap on it. why dont they just cap off our singing at 200 like the other instruments. Are not
ygData.messageBody:
I agree with you Jay. It is ridiculous that our main skills have a cap on
it. why dont they just cap off our singing at 200 like the other
instruments. Are not our voices a form of an instrument. If someone finds a
petition on this to change let me know. I will definatly sign up and i have
alot of friends that will sign :) Bards of the World Unite :)

Taerian Valmont of Povar

> ----- Original Message -----
> From: jay schultze <sartori69@...>
> To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
> Sent: Saturday, November 20, 1999 7:34 PM
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Skill Caps
>
>
> > From: "jay schultze" <sartori69@...>
> >
> > Pure caster and priest types definitely cap at 255 (in-game spouse is a
50
> > cleric). Good question about the hybrids though.
> >
> > I TOTALLY disagree with our musical skills capping at 200. I mean I
think
> > i'm doing ok with 200, but a Bard's main skills are song. Without song
we
> > are basically a nerfed, useless version of every class (except our
> tracking
> > being superior to druids MUAHAHAHA... j/k). Song defines us. Magic
defines
> a
> > wizard. Why the hell should they get 255 and not us? I mean what do we
get
> > that we actually use that caps at 255? Swimming? Alcohol Tolerance?
> >
> > WAKE UP VERANT!
> > Where is the petition? I'd like to sign it...
> >
> > Sartori D'Elsiraad <The Companions>
> > Bard of Kelethin of the 50th Chorus
> > Veeshan
> >
> >
> > >From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
> > >Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > >To: "'eqbards@onelist.com'" <eqbards@onelist.com>
> > >Subject: [eqbards] Skill Caps
> > >Date: Sat, 20 Nov 1999 19:10:01 -0500
> > >
> > >i was curious. i have been thinking more about this lately. do all
the
> > >pure caster classes have their casting skills (e.g. evocation) max out
at
> > >255? along these lines, what skill caps do the priests (shaman,
cleric,
> > >druid) and hybrids (ranger, shadow knight, paladin) have? i am almost
> > >positive the pure casters max at 255, but i am not sure on the other
> > >casting
> > >classes. and in our petition, was anything mentioned about our four
song
> > >skills capping at 255 instead of 200? i can easily understand that
they
> > >should in fact cap at 200, was just wondering what everyone else
thought,
> > >and if it was mentioned.
> > >
> > >Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
> > >Tyria Sarkin, L30 High Elf Wizard
> > >Manda D'ulin, L22 Wood Elf Warrior
> > >Mithaniel Marr Server
> >
> > > > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
> with the subject submissions.
> >
>
>
